title: Krak Session – Plessis Skatepark
content:
Plessis-Robinson’s skatepark is only a few years old and like any skatepark recently build it has its small scene of local kids that love to skate everyday.

So thanks to Ilias, Alex, Tristan, Samuel, Max and Yotam for filming with us!

Join the club to see what is happening skate-wise in your city and join our sessions!
author: thomas
video: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Sr_Cv3PmYZI" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
